# Fury (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | *Demon Lords:* Baphomet, Kostchtchie, Yeenoghu |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day as a free action, you can designate a single creature or object as the target of your fury. You gain a +2 profane bonus on attack rolls against the designated creature or object and deal an extra 2 points of dam age with each successful strike upon it. These bonuses persist until you select a new target for your attacks.

**Fury Domain Spells**

**1** **[[True Strike (Spell)|True Strike]]****:** Grants you a +20 bonus on your next attack roll.

**  ** **[[Weapon Bless (Spell)|Weapon Bless]]****:** Prepare one weapon for combat against a particular foe.

**2** **[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|Bull’s Strength]]****:** Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

**3** **[[Rage (Spell)|Rage]]****:** Grants +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

**4** **[[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]****:** You gain attack bonus, +6 to Str, and 1 hp/level.

**5** **[[Shout (Spell)|Shout]]****:** Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

**6** **[[Song of Discord (Spell)|Song of Discord]]****:** Forces targets to attack each other.

**7** **[[Abyssal Frenzy (Spell)|Abyssal Frenzy]]****:** Regresses target to brutish, demonic version of itself.

**8** **[[Shout, Greater (Spell)|Shout, Greater]]****:** Lets subject produce a devastating yell that deals 10d6 sonic damage, stuns creatures, and damages objects.

**9** **[[Abyssal Frenzy, Mass (Spell)|Abyssal Frenzy, Mass]]****:** As *[[Abyssal Frenzy (Spell)|abyssal frenzy]]*, but 1 creature/level.
